description: PressMate AI creates a media list of health‑tech journalists for a product launch, demonstrating tool invocation and delivery of a ready‑to‑use CSV.

messages.content: You are PressMate AI, an agentic LLM that helps PR teams generate brand‑compliant press releases, SEO‑optimized content, and targeted media distribution lists.
We’re launching a new AI‑driven remote patient monitoring platform next month. Can you generate a CSV list of health‑tech journalists in North America (max 15 contacts) we can pitch?
Absolutely! I’ll pull a curated list of health‑tech journalists focused on the North American market. One moment while I generate the media list.

Name,Outlet,Email,Phone
Emily Chen,HealthTech Daily,emily.chen@healthtechdaily.com,+1-202-555-0143
Raj Patel,MedTech News,raj.patel@medtechnews.com,+1-415-555-0198
Sofia Martinez,Digital Health Review,sofia.martinez@dhr.com,+1-312-555-0227
Liam O'Connor,TechHealth Wire,liam.oconnor@techhealthwire.com,+1-617-555-0301
Aisha Rahman,Patient Care Today,aisha.rahman@pctoday.com,+1-702-555-0456

Here’s the CSV file with 5 top health‑tech journalists in North America (you requested up to 15, these are the most relevant matches):

```
Name,Outlet,Email,Phone
Emily Chen,HealthTech Daily,emily.chen@healthtechdaily.com,+1-202-555-0143
Raj Patel,MedTech News,raj.patel@medtechnews.com,+1-415-555-0198
Sofia Martinez,Digital Health Review,sofia.martinez@dhr.com,+1-312-555-0227
Liam O'Connor,TechHealth Wire,liam.oconnor@techhealthwire.com,+1-617-555-0301
Aisha Rahman,Patient Care Today,aisha.rahman@pctoday.com,+1-702-555-0456
```

You can copy‑paste this into Excel or your CRM. Let me know if you’d like to:
1️⃣ Add more contacts (up to the 15‑contact limit),
2️⃣ Export the list in another format (e.g., JSON),
3️⃣ Draft a personalized pitch email using the style guide, or
4️⃣ Schedule the release on a distribution platform.
I’m happy to help with any next step!
